website_summaries.verdict: A great insulated stainless steel bottle that is available in a variety of sizes and colors.
pros: Double-walled construction keeps liquids hot for 12 hours and cold for 24 hours
cons: The loop cap can lead to spills and can trap liquid, so it needs to be cleaned thoroughly

customer_reviews.title: Worked as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I love this Klean Kanteen Water Bottle, I bought one for every member of my family and we trecked all over Europe with them. Super handy in the super hot weather. It kept our water cool and refreshing all day long and helped keep the beverage costs down. It is also easy to tote, designed to be able to clip on to your backpack. I paired this water bottle with the re-freezable ice cubes and we were like seasoned travelers. :)
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong with Klean Kanteen
customer_reviews.text: This is my first Klean Kanteen and I absolutely love it. It keeps my water cold all day long and its stainless steel composition is chemical-free. No plastic chemical junk leaking into my water! That's a win. ;) The lid goes on and off with no problem and seals really well. No leaking. I would highly recommend this bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa A.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Kept Water Ice Cold All Day!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a summer trip to Orlando hoping for something to keep my water cold for a day in the Florida heat at a theme park, so I can't speak to long-term use. This bottle was perfect! I put several ice cubes in it with my water before I left in the morning and by the time I got back that night, most of the ice was still there! Plus there was barely any condensation. The only downside was the bottle was a bit hard to get open each time, but that's likely what's keeping the water cold and the bottle leak-proof. Totally worth it for ice cold water all day!
customer_reviews.author: Obianuju Akaniru

customer_reviews.title: Amazing insulation! Slightly different size than the regular Kleen Kanteens.
customer_reviews.text: Ice water will stay cold in this -- inside a hot car -- until the next day. Sometimes going in and out of a hot car and air conditioned buildings, there is still ice inside. Hot insulation is also good, though it doesn't hold heat as long as cold. I have an older vacuum insulated Kleen Kanteen, that appears to have thicker walls, and this one outperforms it. Like other Kleen Kanteens, I suppose the enamel will come off, but it hasn't started to happen yet. This doesn't fit in certain holders that would hold a regular, uninsulated Kleen Kanteen, but the size is similar.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best price available in market for kleen kanteen !!
customer_reviews.text: If you are a someone who is hunting to get a good stainless steel thermos or bottles. Stop reading any other reviews or researching. Trust me this is my honest opinion. I have researched a lot on these thermos. Thermos brand is the best and equally good is this kleen kanteen. I was looking for a sleek thermos and this is the one that i wanted. The price is surprisingly higher even in target or other retailers. Amazon is the ONLY place to have such a low pricing. This keeps water hot or cold for prolonged time as mentioned by the manufacturer. Best ever thermos to buy. I recommend doing hand washing.
customer_reviews.author: ella char

customer_reviews.title: Excellent insulated reusable water bottle
customer_reviews.text: Love the Klean Kanteens! The loop handle is the only drawback on this one but we were able to get an alternate sports cap top. The color is a muted green - just what we were looking for. The bottle is easy to clean with a bottle brush - we use the ones for baby bottles. It keeps drink cold and does not leak as long as lids are on correctly. The bottle itself does not cause any funky tastes or odors to the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: kbbramsey

customer_reviews.title: Double-Wall Vacuum-Insulated 18/8 Food Grade Stainless Steel, Leak Proof, Light Weight 20 oz
customer_reviews.text: The headline said it all. Klean Kanteen is the only brand out there (that I know) having wordings "18/8 Food Grade Stainless Steel" on the bottom of their vacuum insulated bottles. Questionable: Many brands out there don't have wording "18/8 Stainless" on their metal bottles, but those have been listed as stainless steel. Are you sure? If you want REAL 18/8 food grade stainless steel bottles, go find Klean Kanteen. In addition, I've upgraded the (free) leak-proof loop cap with Klean Kanteen stainless steel leak-proof loop cap.
customer_reviews.author: alex 3D

customer_reviews.title: I really like the color and size selection also
customer_reviews.text: I’m never going back to a sweaty, single walled stainless steel bottle ever again. I filled this up with water in the morning and forgot it in my car at work. 8 hours later after 100+ degree heat inside the car, I still had ice cubes and very cold water to drink on my way home. I really like the color and size selection also. I did upgrade my plastic cap for a stainless steel version because I often put essential oil in my bottle, and I was that it was going to leech chemicals out of the regular black plastic cap.
customer_reviews.author: Brock

customer_reviews.title: Love these Kanteens!
customer_reviews.text: I received one of these products as a promotional gift from a company. I fell in love with it!! Ordered two more on here at a good price. Keeps things hot and cold for much longer periods of time than I ever thought possible. Taste of stored drinks do not seem to stay in the container - for instance, I filled with beer for a music festival that didn't allow glass containers (brilliant!! and beer was COLD to the very end on a 97 degree day!) and then used it for water. No problem. Love the blue color I ordered, too.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Hott

customer_reviews.title: Keeps water hot for ages, and really pretty too!
customer_reviews.text: I adore this brand. During the winter it kept my near-boiling water at the same temperature for hours, and was still decently hot 20 hours later! This is my second one; the first one was unfortunately lost during my travels but showed no signs of wear. I did drop it on a stone floor and it got a few small dents in a few places, but it didn't affect how it works.
customer_reviews.author: fluffybear

customer_reviews.title: LOVE my Classic Klean Kanteen Insulated 20 ounce bottle
customer_reviews.text: Finally decided to stop drinking plastic bottled water and I couldn't be happier. Not only do I save lots of money but I put filtered water in this and it tastes so fresh and clean. After drinking from this bottle for about a week I took a sip out of bottled water and wow what a difference. The retail bottled water tastes like fish swam in it for a month. I put cold filtered water in my Klean Kanteen and it's always cold. Haven't tried anything but water but I'm sure it will also work great for hot liquids. I purchased the Alink 15.7-Inch bottle brush cleaner and it does a great job cleaning this out with ease.
customer_reviews.author: likes to share

customer_reviews.title: Keeps water COLD
customer_reviews.text: I'm amazed at how cold my water stays in my insulated Klean Kanteen, even after sitting for a whole day in a hot car. My only complaint is the weight of this water bottle, which can be cumbersome after a while. I have both the twist on cap and the sport cap and neither have leaked or given me any troubles.
customer_reviews.author: KR77

customer_reviews.title: Great at first, fails after a few uses.
customer_reviews.text: This "Kanteen" was great at first. I would fill it with ice, add water,go off for a day of kayaking, and still have ice remaining when I got home. But then one day, for no apparent reason found that my ice melted within two hours, and I was drinking warm water. Next day, I filled it with ice and put it on the kitchen counter. Within 15 minutes, condensation had formed on the exterior. While there is no mark on the outside or inside, the vacuum insulation has been compromised. This product was good for about a dozen uses, and is now junk.
customer_reviews.author: Cape Steve

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: For some unknown reason the Klean Kanteens that I buy from Amazon do not function like the ones that I purchase elsewhere. This one does not keep my water cold for 12 hrs or on long road trips whereas my other K Kanteen waters in this same style do. In my family we now fight over who gets stuck with the Klean Kanteen bottle we bought from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Darci Connor

customer_reviews.title: Great - Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I really like this water bottle. True to form, it keeps my water cold and ice lasts all day. The twist top seals everything in, so there are no leaks. Color is true to picture (I got the Beet Red). My only complaint is the bottle is very tall and skinny. It doesn't fit straight in fridge doors or water machines, I have to hold it at an angle.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite water bottle- and I've used my fair share. It keeps things colder/hotter longer than S'well or any other insulated bottle I've used. I highly recommend it. It's high quality and functional. I take it to every work out class I go to and I actually fill up with ice water when I got to bed so I have icy cold water when I wake up in the morning. It's absolutely all it's cracked up to be.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Jane

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd Klean Kanteen and I absolutely love them. They keep ice not for hours but for DAYS. I have left them in my car in 100° summer temps and my water is still ice cold. I pair it with the sport cap which is great for the gym and work. The reason I have 3 is the other is the 40 oz nothing wrong just a bit too big to lug to the gym and the other has the larger opening which I use for coffee and yes it equally stays hot.
customer_reviews.author: Mushers

customer_reviews.title: Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing...I use it everyday (multiple times) and it keeps my water/ice water super cold for HOURS. And, it never sweats at all. I appreciate not wasting paper or plastic cups at work and the size is great. I will say that the mouth piece a little on the large size. I'm a bigger guy, and it flows very well, so I don't think this is a bad thing at all, but wanted to share for those of you who might want a smaller nozzle. I definitely recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: David R.

customer_reviews.title: It's great for a time, but it's not durable.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for about 7-8 months. The first 5 months, I really loved it. It saved me from the heat of summer here in my country because it kept the water super cold and the ice cubes solid. However, that, it didn't keep the cold anymore. Useless. Now I have a stainless steel bottle good for nothing. My daughter's Tiger vacuum insulated bottle that is over 10 years old works better.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Does not keep water cold
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son, he said the water was cold at most for 4 hours . It is nice and easy to carry but not worth the money .
customer_reviews.author: Ninel

customer_reviews.title: Really Keeps Water Cold
customer_reviews.text: So far, I have only used cold water, but it keeps it cold for hours. I filled it up at 7:30am, forgot about it and went outside in 90+ degree heat. Remembered it about 4 hours later at it was literally just as cold as it would have been at 8am. Yesterday, I put cold water in and left it for about 6 hours. When I drank the water, it was still cold, but not nearly as cold as it would have been 6 hours before. However, my dasani bottle that I left out was warm, so by comparison it was amazing.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Definitely keeps drinks iced cold for hours. Becareful tho...
customer_reviews.text: Carbonated drinks don’t belong in these. The vacuum seal seems to make carbonated drinks spray all over every time I open it. But sadly, I lost it. And I’m highly upset. It was my favorite canteen. It kept my drinks iced cold for hours at work. I was told about this product in 2016 and it took me forever to finally make the purchase. MAKE SURE TO PURCHASE THE DOUBLE ISULATED.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need in a water bottle for under $30!
customer_reviews.text: These are everything you need in a beverage bottle! Durable, stylish, functional (I bought the sports top to use at work as I tend to drink more water if I don't have to unscrew the top all of the time) Also, this thing will keep your hot or cold beverage at the desired temperature ALL DAY. I bought one for each of my family members this Christmas and all of them have went out of their way to let me know how much they have been using and loving them, too!
customer_reviews.author: gail lumsden

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous color. No leaks even when banging around the backseat or falling on the ground during a hike. Kept my ice water super cold at the beach and during trips in the mountains for at least 10-12 hours. Really impressed! Also has a cute built in cup and easy to grip top. Very happy with this item.
customer_reviews.author: GlitterLounge

customer_reviews.title: Love this water bottle.
customer_reviews.text: Ice holds for 12-24 hrs even in hot weather. I set this in an 80-90 degree aircraft all day and it stays cool. Also, these are durable. Example: I accidentally drove my car over my backpack. In that backpack was my laptop and this water bottle. NO damage to my laptop thanks to this klean kanteen taking the hit. Only a small dent to the bottle itself, no damage to the internal bottle. Buy it once, buy it for good.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: They do a great job with keeping cold liquids cold
customer_reviews.text: I have several of these bottles now and I purchased several for others as well. They do a great job with keeping cold liquids cold. I have never put hot liquid in the bottle therefore, I cannot comment on the bottles in the building to keep hot things hot. Other than the price, these bottles are well worth it. I'll buy them again
customer_reviews.author: J. ReedTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Insulated Cup!
customer_reviews.text: I am loving my Klean Kanteen bottle so much I purchased one for my mom. I can put ice in there in the morning and continue to add water all day and it stays cold. I added the sports top to my bottle and I like how I can easily still drink my water while I am driving and keep my eyes on the road. I can leave this cup on my desk while I am working and it does not sweat all over my desk. I really want to try the wide mouth insulated cup next!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Awsome bottle
customer_reviews.text: Really a good bottle for keeping the water cold. Put ice cubes in with the water and the cubes were still not completely melted the next day even after a refill of the water during the day. Bottle was given as a gift have heard nothing but good things about the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: mncharder

customer_reviews.title: Durable and FANTASTIC
customer_reviews.text: I love this, I got a 3 pack of the nipple tops in lime green, they fit on this insulated canteen. I put ice and water and stick of charcoal in it, had great tasting water and it kept the ice through a couple of refills (amazing) Florida is not for the faint of heart this time of year and I do alot of bike riding, walking, cool water is a MUST. PS, I have dropped it twice so far and not even a dent, a couple of scratches since I dropped it off my bike while riding.
customer_reviews.author: SP BisbeeTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Hard to open sometimes
customer_reviews.text: I like it, but it can be very hard to screw open sometimes. I'm not sure if it's too tight of a seal or the cap isn't designed to allow a good grip. I have several bottles of this style, and don't have a problem with the other ones.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette

customer_reviews.title: 5 months in and its still almost brand new
customer_reviews.text: After purchasing this water bottle I will never by another brand other then Klean Kanteen again. I poured some cold water in one night, forgot it on the counter with the cap off, and came back a significant time later and it was like I just filled it. Its extremely sturdy (I did end up denting mine but only because I had dropped it very hard on a concrete surface. The dent is small and doesn't affect the overall use) I loved it so much I ended up buying one for my daughter and now she loves hers too!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed that my bottle arrived already with a dent in ...
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed that my bottle arrived already with a dent in it. It's too much of a pain to send it back so I'll keep it. Aside from the bottle being heavy because of the insulation, it's great. I can fill it with ice water and carry it around for hours on a hot day and the water stays cold.
customer_reviews.author: WeaselMama

customer_reviews.title: ... Klean Kanteen bottles and the insulated bottles are a fantastic step up
customer_reviews.text: I've long been a fan of Klean Kanteen bottles and the insulated bottles are a fantastic step up. I often will fill this bottle with ice and water and then grab a non-insulated 40oz bottle and fill it with water to refill this bottle (it only holds 20oz of water, which is on the small side for me). The ice will last all day and it is the best way to have cold water when you need it.
customer_reviews.author: M. FitzGerald

customer_reviews.title: Love this product, it keeps it hot... or cold for a very long time!
customer_reviews.text: Love how long it keeps my drinks hot or cold! I bought the blue kanteen and I love the color. The only down side to it is the cap. Sometimes it's difficult to twist open the top, but I guess I can just buy the other caps they offer. Otherwise it's a great insulated drink holder!!
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Helps me drink more water!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this water bottle to have water handy and easily accessible for while I'm nursing my son. I purchased the sport cap to make drinking from it easier. I fill up my bottle before bed so that I can wake up to nurse in the morning and have cold water right at our nursing area. Being able to drink enough fluids with a newborn would be impossible for me without this bottle!
customer_reviews.author: Mi Real Food

customer_reviews.title: Klean Kanteen
customer_reviews.text: Bought and used this for our trip to Italy. It kept the water cool, and it was easy to transport. The only critique is the top, you have to unscrew it in order to drink from the canteen. I also didn't like it when you filled it all the way and placed the top on water would overflow. Otherwise we really like the product.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Great insulation
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about it - leak proof, very easy to clean - no small divots or hard to scrub places. It keeps my water temperature exact. My only issue is - while durable overall - it was easily dented. It dropped from my couch (about 2 feet) onto a wood floor and got a pretty sizable dent on the outside as a result.
customer_reviews.author: AmPaul

customer_reviews.title: Great bottles, prefer a different color
customer_reviews.text: Love the bottle, but the color (Quiet Storm) is not true to the photo. In person, it's much more of a baby/powder blue. I exchanged it for a color I like better, and that one is AWESOME. Keeps my drink cold all day. Haven't tried hot drinks yet (give it a couple months for the weather to cool down...), but I have high hopes.
customer_reviews.author: spk4thetrees

customer_reviews.title: Adios to my hydro
customer_reviews.text: Great water bottle. Sadly the first one came with a couple dents but my replacement bottle looks great and keeps my water cold without any leaks in my purse !!! Bye bye hydro flask
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Really does keep water cold
customer_reviews.text: I debated whether to spend the few extra bucks for the insulated one, and then I remembered how hot it gets here in summer. Now I'm very glad I went for it. It works! It's also a lot lighter than I expected, lighter even than some of my plastic bottles. A+++ will buy again. Also I love the orange.
customer_reviews.author: T L.

customer_reviews.title: Sweat free!
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded from the non-insulated 20 oz. and this make a huge difference. The bottle doesn't "sweat" all over in my bag. It also keeps water cold while not being too cold to hold the bottle comfortably. We put a sport cap on it and this makes for the perfect summer time water bottle. I also like the the steel won't crack or chip and will stay relatively new looking for longer than the painted bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Keeps water SUPER cold, but paint scuffs easily
customer_reviews.text: As a college student, I was in the market for a bottle that could keep me hydrated, and my water ice cold throughout a busy day. This Klean Kanteen accomplishes both! I did a lot of research between this bottle, and the similar product from Hydroflask, but ultimately decided on this one. The only thing I would say is the paint scratches off and scuffs fairly easily. After a few weeks of use, there are already several scratches. I also love the color!!
customer_reviews.author: squirt

customer_reviews.title: Great product, keeps your drinks cold for hours
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Klean Kanteen I buy and they are fantastic. They keep your drinks cold for a long time, several hours. They are easy to carry and look great. I downgraded from 5 to 4 stars just because the last one I got had a dent out of the package, which probably has more to do with seller and shipping protection than with the product itself anyway. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Osvaldo Santos

customer_reviews.title: Works well and looks great too!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! The insulation is great! It takes a bit of getting used to since I had a non-insulated one that was the same size on the outside and this one is smaller on the inside due to the insulation. But it works really well!
customer_reviews.author: Paolo Panimus

customer_reviews.title: Great water bottle
customer_reviews.text: I use this bottle every day at college and it keeps my water cold. The 20oz is a great size because it fits in car cup holders and water bottle pockets on backpacks. It will dent if dropped but that goes for most stainless water bottles. I have not used it for hot liquids.
customer_reviews.author: Philip P

customer_reviews.title: This is my 2nd Klean Kanteen and I love it. The first was not insulated
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd Klean Kanteen and I love it. The first was not insulated, but was slightly bigger. Now that I've experienced the benefit of having the vacuum insulated version - I love it. My water stays cold for hours. I haven't used it for hot liquids yet.
customer_reviews.author: Healthy gums

customer_reviews.title: Pretty color. Nice clean stainless interior with no odor ...
customer_reviews.text: Pretty color. Nice clean stainless interior with no odor to it. Very difficult to drink from if you don't have the "sippy cup lid" attachment- which is just another expense. I don't believe you can get 20 oz in it unless you leave the lid off. I think it is an over rated product.
customer_reviews.author: Mag W

customer_reviews.title: Beet Root Pink-ish
customer_reviews.text: The beet root color is more rosy pink than in the photo. Buyer beware. I’m keeping it. Keeps coffee piping hot without any off flavours from plastics.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Bob Moffet

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this bottle! We have been using Klean Kanteens for about a year, and this is our first time trying the insulated, and I'm already hooked. The 20 oz insulated appears to be roughly the same dimensions as the 27 oz uninsulated ones we have. The color is really pretty, I love the matte finish. And it's keeping my water perfectly cold.
customer_reviews.author: MaineMama

customer_reviews.title: Manufacturing
customer_reviews.text: The material used is manufactured and produced in China. I would prefer an insulated water bottle made in America. Seems sturdy and insulates well.
customer_reviews.author: Glen Z

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING ice retention...also, buy the sport cap!
customer_reviews.text: I was shocked at how well this thing holds ice! I put 6-7 cubes of ice and water in it at 6:30am. I carried it all day. At the end of the day it had a little water and ice left in it. I left it by my bed and in the morning there was STILL ice in it. That's 24 hours, people...and the ice still wasn't completely melted. Also, I bought and use the Sport Cap 3.0. It works very well.
customer_reviews.author: DCT

customer_reviews.title: Great Insulated Bottle, Sport Cap 3.0 sweats.
customer_reviews.text: I have this in the non-insulated version and got this one to prevent the outside from sweating. I've left ice water in it overnight, and the ice is still frozen in the morning. Took one star off because the Sport Cap 3.0 sweats as does the top of the bottle when it's on. The insulated cap is solid and longer, which prevents the neck and cap from sweating.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy McManus

customer_reviews.title: Great eco-friendly reusable water bottle - keeps drinks ice cold!
customer_reviews.text: Great insulated water bottle that my 10 year old son uses at school and at camp. WE bought the sport cap to go along with it so he could drink more easily. It's a great bottle that keeps drinks COLD for 10 hours even in a hot car. I have one and love mine. I'm sure you're love it if you spend the $$. They aren't cheap but they're worth it.
customer_reviews.author: zunamom

customer_reviews.title: Amazing water bottle
customer_reviews.text: I love this water bottle. It keeps water cold for days. There is also no "sweat" on the outside of the bottle when you first add cold liquid. I would recommend that you get the sports cap if you are planning to use it for the gym as it can be difficult to drink out of the regular cap when on an elliptical machine. Overall, I am very satisfied and this is the best water bottle I have purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Martusia

customer_reviews.title: Not that great
customer_reviews.text: Kinda disappointed that I have not been able to see this cup hold ice 24 hours I bought it thinking it would compete with my camalbak and others in the 20oz size. But it has not held ice.
customer_reviews.author: steve watson

customer_reviews.title: I loved my Vacuum Insulated Klean Kanteen when I purchased it
customer_reviews.text: I loved my Vacuum Insulated Klean Kanteen when I purchased it. They are not bad bottles. But I would not buy it again. They are too frágile. I let mine drop from waist high and it slightly dented the bottom. Now ti does not keep things cool and frozen as before. Ice would remain frozen for 24 hours before. No longer. A similar thing happened to my first bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Pepebuho

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and the matte finish! However there are times when this thing leaks. It might be from the way I screw the top up sometimes but as a precaution, best to turn it upside down to check for leaks before putting in your gym bag. To avoid getting your stuff inside your bag wet like I discovered one time! But aside from that, klean kanteen delivers on its promise to keep beverages hot or cold for a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: S. Abrera

customer_reviews.title: Great kanteen!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an insulated water bottle with no plastic. I ordered this bottle and also bought the stainless steel Klean Kanteen cap separately. I LOVE this bottle, and it retains the temperature very well. I do not often drink cold things, but I drink hot water all day. This bottle holds the heat well. I carry this water bottle everywhere with me. Also, the blue color is so pretty.
customer_reviews.author: CrazyMixedLady

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bottle and the sport cap for the gym, but I ended up keeping it at home to help increase daily hydration. I put a few ice pieces in it and refill throughout the day. There is often ice left in the next morning. I like the 20 oz size. Perfect for my use.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Great canteen, so-so matte finish
customer_reviews.text: I am a fan of Klean Kanteens, but not enjoying the matte finish. It got marked up the first time I used it, and it was only in my tote bag for the day. The shiny finishes which I bought for my kids (who have dropped them already resulting in no damage) seem much more durable and pleasing to the eye. The performance of the canteen is great, as always.
customer_reviews.author: momof2

customer_reviews.title: Best water bottle to date!
customer_reviews.text: This bottle is completely awesome! I love the insulation and it works perfectly, exactly as described. I take this to work early in the morning and have accidentally left it out all night long until the next morning to find it still cold with ice cubes! Will buy again. I'm thinking of getting one for my wife. Best water bottle to date!
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Great insulated bottle
customer_reviews.text: Love Klean Kanteen and got this to replace my beloved first one that I lost. The beet red color is beautiful. No funny smell and arrived shrink wrapped and in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: book a day reader

customer_reviews.title: Great, I love it!
customer_reviews.text: This flask is a damn good flask for the price and I love it! I made piping hot tea at 4am, and it was still piping hot when I drank it at 9am, like nothing had changed. I think their official word on it is that they keeo hot drinks hot for around 12 hours and cold drinks cold for 24. Just don't close it too tightly like I do, because you'll have trouble opening it again without your hand aching. I've also used it to crush instant ramen, it's quite strong.
customer_reviews.author: Aarif

customer_reviews.title: Love the new insulated line.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Klean Kanteens for a while. I veered off to another product for a while, but then came back to these when they had enhanced their insulated offerings. My most recent purchase, the blue one, is great. I get compliments on the color. It also fits perfectly in a sling that I had purchased directly from Klean Kanteen's site for my original (non-insulated) kanteen.
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia

customer_reviews.title: Best Bottle Ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Klean Kanteen and I will never purchase from another company again! My water stays ice cold, no leaks (even when thrown half-hazardly into my bag) and it’s great for the environment!
customer_reviews.author: MrsMadeline

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this bottle. Finally a bottle that doesn't have any condensation with cold drinks and my ice cubes stay all day! I was hesitant to buy anything but glass but after breaking 2 "unbreakable" glass bottles with protective silicone sleeves, I decided to try the healthiest stainless steel alternative and I am not disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Kim D

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with dent and the paint chips
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with a small dent, which I thought was just cosmetic, but my ice isn’t staying solid for more than an hour. I love this brand and the sport cap is great. The biggest risk is how it’s shipped. Also, I haven’t dropped this bottle or been rough with it at all and the paint is already chipped.
customer_reviews.author: Perry and Hailey

customer_reviews.title: High quality and keeps water cold a long time
customer_reviews.text: I really like all of the Klean Kanteen products we've purchased, particularly the insulated ones. I bought this one for my son and he uses it all the time. The color on this one is great, too.
customer_reviews.author: D. Dale

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: You can't go wrong, works very well. I use it mostly for cold and it holds temperature very well.
customer_reviews.author: V. C.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent insulated water bottle
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my water freezing cold all day even when left in a hot car (90 plus degrees). A little big in size but you get used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Starr R. Diethorn

customer_reviews.title: Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I had to return this because my little one didn't like it but I love them!! I have 2 for water bottles and 1 for coffee! You cant beat Klean kanteen!!
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting
customer_reviews.text: I have had this bottle for awhile now and really like it. Keeps beverages the same temperature and it is durable.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: This is the perfect water bottle.
customer_reviews.text: I already own a couple of Klean Kanteen bottles. The insulated one keeps ice from melting for a couple of hours longer than the non-insulated. I'll be buying insulated from here on out.
customer_reviews.author: dr. lowbrow

customer_reviews.title: The insulated one is my favorite. Water stays cool in a warm car for ...
customer_reviews.text: I have several Klean Kanteens. The insulated one is my favorite. Water stays cool in a warm car for close to 24 hours. Get the cap you don't have to remove to drink, if you don't want to unscrew the top every time you use it.
customer_reviews.author: Teddy026

customer_reviews.title: Love this canteen I mean kanteen
customer_reviews.text: I take this thing with me every where, stay hydrated peeps
customer_reviews.author: fabian loza

customer_reviews.title: It is a nice water bottle
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice water bottle. I like the color but it doesn't keep my drink cold for it's price. I have a cheaper one by slm that keeps my drinks cold for 24+ hours. The issue was it had no spout option and I need that for my exercise classes. Again 3 stars for the nice bottle, color and spout or twist top option but totally useless for keeping water cold.
customer_reviews.author: MSW2020

customer_reviews.title: Get this!!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Buy this and stop using so many plastic water bottles. It keeps the cold water very cold. Highly recommended. I bought it refurbished/used from Amazon and it arrived in new condition.
customer_reviews.author: Kilo

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works great, keeps cold stuff cold for 24 hours and hot stuff hot
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent insulated bottle
customer_reviews.text: Excellent insulated bottle. Still has ice in it after 24 hours with multiple water refills. I use the sports cap; not sure how well it works with the standard lid.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Stayed hot as long as it was filled. Once volume decreAsed started to cook but definitely would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Joann S

customer_reviews.title: Recycle the plastic and buy one of these
customer_reviews.text: Best water bottle ever. fits our bicycles. Went a whole day of riding and still have ice. How refreshing is that. Going to buy for Xmas presents this year. Get away from the taste of plastic and realize your water and stay cool and taste good.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Great size and durable.
customer_reviews.text: Love this water bottle. It's big enough to last a while and it keeps my water cold. I like the round top because I can hook it to our backpack when hiking, this big bottle doesn't stay in the built in bottle pouches on the packs. It's been dropped quite a few times and it just has a few dings, nothing major. Totally kid proof too.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Super good-looking and doesn't leak
customer_reviews.text: Got this in green and black for $15. Super good-looking and doesn't leak. So so sexy. Keeps my drinks warm/ cold too. Even more sexy. Simple yet sturdy construction. Cannot ask for more.
customer_reviews.author: Paulino

customer_reviews.title: Nice size
customer_reviews.text: The opening is a little large for drinking directly from.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used mine yet but hubby loves his which is blue. The blue color is not shinny like this one. It is matte in color but works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Klean Kanteens are pretty good across the board
customer_reviews.text: Klean Kanteens are pretty good across the board. This has decent insulation, but if you're truly looking for insulation, maybe look at a real Thermos. That aside, it's typical of the quality you can expect from this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Kleen Kanteen Classic Double Wall is a Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product, own several now. Highly recommend the double wall version. Keeps drinks colder longer than any other product I’ve owned.
customer_reviews.author: Wend-Sund

customer_reviews.title: I love this bottle
customer_reviews.text: The insulation on this bottle is incredible. I put cold water in it when I go to bed, ​and it's still cold when I wake up. What's more impressive is how this bottle doesn't sweat at all, not even when I fill the bottle half with ice. I love this bottle, and will be buying more of them as birthdays and holidays come around.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Teige

customer_reviews.title: Brrrr - cold for hours and hours
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Keeps liquids cold for hours and hours - the ice doesn't even melt! Also fits in the cup holder in my car, which is important. And I love the color ;-)
customer_reviews.author: E. Maselli

customer_reviews.title: Great canteen for hiking
customer_reviews.text: Ice stays for more than 24 hours! Great canteen for hiking!
customer_reviews.author: Grammy

customer_reviews.title: Light but sturdy and the color is wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I have had other stainless steel bottles, but none come close to this one. Light but sturdy and the color is wonderful. Drinks are cool to cold all day, even in a hot vehicle. I plan on buying in multiple sizes to use for camping and running to the office. Thank you for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As an added bonus if I pack anything else that needs to stay cool in his lunch this acts as an ice pack
customer_reviews.text: Needed a water bottle for my son to take with his lunch. Never have to worry about this leaking and it keeps his water cold until lunch. As an added bonus if I pack anything else that needs to stay cool in his lunch this acts as an ice pack, but without the sweating and getting everything all wet.
customer_reviews.author: kdoggiedog

customer_reviews.title: Klean Kanteen Stainless Steel Bottle
customer_reviews.text: Good product I would buy it again, and recommend it to anyone who's looking for something like this especially for this low price Works exactly like it should be not much to say about it! It does what it's design/made for. I would recommend to a friend!
customer_reviews.author: Laczko Studio

customer_reviews.title: This water bottle comes with me everyday (holding cold and hot water) and does a great job. I unfortunately have dropped it 2-3 times ...
customer_reviews.text: I did not own a vacuum insulated bottle before this one and I would never go back. This water bottle comes with me everyday (holding cold and hot water) and does a great job. I unfortunately have dropped it 2-3 times and it does have a few dings in it but it still does the job. It's a great size and fits into the cup holders of my car. Great partner to have at work, school and on hikes.
customer_reviews.author: Hope McDavid

customer_reviews.title: Best insulated bottle
customer_reviews.text: I was sick of having hot water by the time that I eat my lunch and looked for a solution. This bottle is amazing! It not only keeps the water super it actually keeps the ice all day. I have opened it 24 hours later to refill and it still has ice in it from the day before. This bottle is also the perfect size it fits nice and trim in the water bottle pocket in my backpack. A great product that I know should last for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Dented merchandise
customer_reviews.text: Bottle arrived damaged and dented which is disappointing. My son was starting school so I didn’t have time to send it back and get it replaced. The water bottle itself is still insulated and keeps his water cold for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Mac Kay

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product!
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my water nice and cold. Doesn't matter if it's only half full it stays nice and cold.
customer_reviews.author: Johnna Riggs

customer_reviews.title: Quality product, keeps liquids cold. I think the ...
customer_reviews.text: Quality product, keeps liquids cold. I think the mouth of the bottle is too wide, it allows for ice cubes but is too big to drink in a car or another environment with lots of motion without spilling.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Love that Kanteen!
customer_reviews.text: I love this kanteen! I carry it with me every day with my tea in it. It's so handy and beautiful. I'm thinking of getting a smaller one for when I travel. I can buy my drink at the airport and not worry about it spilling onboard.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Smith

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I like this kanteen but I just don't like unscrewing it every time
customer_reviews.author: Summer

product_meta.title: Klean Kanteen Classic Double Wall Vacuum Insulated Stainless Steel Water Bottle with Leak Proof Loop Cap
product_meta.description: The Klean Kanteen Vacuum Insulated Classic 20oz water bottle combines the original, iconic, Classic bottle with high-performance, double-wall vacuum insulation to create a highly versatile bottle. The 20oz Insulated Classic water bottle was designed with high performance in mind, keeping beverages hot for 20 hours and iced for 50 hours. Crafted from high quality, durable food grade 18/8 stainless steel with a wide 1.75 inch (44mm) opening fits ice, is easy to fill, pour and drink from. Electropolished interior and rounded corners make the Vacuum Insulated Classic 20oz bottle easy to clean and maintain. All Klean Kanteen products are made using safe healthy materials and backed by the Strong as Steel Guarantee. Hand washing recommended.
feature_bullets: Double Wall Vacuum Insulation, Keeps Hot up to 20 Hours, Keeps Iced up to 50 Hours
Large 1.75 inch (44 millimeter) opening fits ice, easy to fill and pour; Compatible with all Klean Kanteen Classic caps
Backed by the Klean Kanteen Strong as Steel Guarantee
